Description: Head from a blue glazed composition figure of a cow with black details, including the eyes, and spots on the neck. Broken off at the neck. Top of head and horns broken off and missing. Glaze on the nose is chipped. Has a drilled hole in each side at the level of the ears.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: G. Pinch, Votive offerings to Hathor (Oxford 1993), pp.161, 174, pl.35A (misnumbered BM 48908).
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1995 Feb-May, Atlanta, Emory University, Reflections of Women in the New Kingdom
